trigger.title: Trigger: Levitation
trigger.description: Triggers when the player has the levitation status effect.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance between the position where the player started levitating and the player's current position.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the levitation in ticks.
